original_text: While they were at the great rock in Gibeon, Amasa came to meet them. Joab was wearing his military tunic, and strapped over it at his waist was a belt with a dagger in its sheath. As he stepped forward, it dropped out of its sheath.
korean_text: 기브온 큰 바위 곁에 이르매 아마사가 맞으러 오니 그 때에 요압이 군복을 입고 띠를 띠고 칼집에 꽂은 칼을 허리에 맸는데 그가 나아갈 때에 칼이 빠져 떨어졌더라

sentences.original_text: While they were at the great rock in Gibeon
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 기브온의 큰 바위에 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Joab was wearing his military tunic
and strapped over it at his waist was a belt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 위 허리에 띠가 매여져 있었다

sentences.original_text: with a dagger in its sheath
it dropped out of its sheath
